extendedInfo.description: Death Rules The World.The Art of Minimalism, Atom Launcherâs 1.4 has just released. Now Atom offers exclusive widgets (Clock, Memo, Calendar, Contact and Switch Widget) Experience new optimized ICS launcher if you have ICS version android phoneDonâtâ Miss Atom Store! You can see beautiful art-themes that collaborate with famous artists (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dlto.atom.store)***Main Features- Exclusive Widgets: Clock, Memo, Calendar, Contact, Switch and Search Bar - Gestures: Simple Use with Finching, Double Touching, Sliding, Long Touching. - Smart Folder: Available adding folders on All apps and Home screen, flexible size - Dock bar: Available putting max 20 apps on the dock bar, Emotional Filter Effect, Various Screen Switching, Opacity Adjustment- Multi Wallpaper : Offering various wallpapers in one package, min 3 to max 24- Available for Changes by Setting Point Color Changes: Available for Color Changes for widgets, Menu, Guide, or icons  - Live Background: Changes to dull backgrounds with dynamic backgrounds- Wide-Range Theme Support: Wide-range theme support by Atom Launcher and also existing SSKIN and GO Launcher themes*** Features- High quality : Launcher for Ice Cream Sandwich / Jellybean (from Android ICS/JB 4.0.2) - Light & Easy : Offers Select Options by light and easy launcher - Stylish : Stylish UI with backgrounds, icons, and points colors - Smart : Optimized themes for ICS, Automatically supporting existing launcher such as SSKIN and Go Launcher - Fun: Offers fun-interactive themes by various backgrounds, live backgrounds and ICSâs widgets*** Attention- Available from above Android OS 4.0.2 version- The application needs 10 MB in total to save theme resources. - Because of enhancing usability, installed theme doesnât appear- Not Available for Tab Device (X-large screen)- Badge: Display missed call, unread message (Supprots only defalt apps on your Android device, Could not support the funtion by devices)*** Customer SupportPlease leave reviews or comments. Your review will be appreciated. For more information or support, please visit - Facebook:  http://www.facebook.com/atom.themes- CS E-mail:  atom.launcher@dlto.co.kr- CS Center : http://cs.prompt.co.kr/

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Nice color contrast. Not heavy on system resources. Will fc however if attempting multi wallpaper on my gs note 2. Not sure if confined to this particular theme, or launcher itself.
reviews.author: Todd Bryant
